title: We shrunk our Javascript monorepo git size
dot:
digraph MonorepoLessons{rankdir=TB;node[shape=box, style=filled, color=lightblue, fontname="Arial", fontsize=12];subgraph cluster_repo{label="The Monorepo at Microsoft";style=rounded;color=blue;MonorepoSize[label="178GB repo
~20 million lines of code
2,500 packages
1,000+ monthly users"];RepoGrowth[label="Continuous Growth"];Challenges[label="Challenges:
- Git clone issues in Europe
- Hard to maintain
- Rapid growth"];MonorepoSize->RepoGrowth;RepoGrowth->Challenges;}subgraph cluster_lesson1{label="Lesson #1: Avoid Large Trees";style=rounded;color=green;LargeFolderIssue[label="40k+ files in one folder
Large tree objects"];Solution1[label="Batch change files"];Solution2[label="Auto-cleanup pipeline"];LargeFolderIssue->Solution1;LargeFolderIssue->Solution2;}subgraph cluster_lesson2{label="Lesson #2: Git Compression Issues";style=rounded;color=orange;VersioningFlow[label="Separate versioned branch for semver tracking"];Issue[label="125GB extra git data
Incorrect compression of
CHANGELOG files"];Debugging[label="Old git packing code issue"];Solution3[label="Repack with
'git repack -adf --window=250'"];Solution4[label="Use new git
packing strategy"];Result[label="Repo reduced
178GB -> 5GB"];VersioningFlow->Issue;Issue->Debugging;Debugging->Solution3;Debugging->Solution4;Solution4->Result;}subgraph cluster_wrapup{label="Wrap-Up";style=rounded;color=purple;Insights[label="Key Insights:
- Keep folder sizes small
- Watch for path walk issues
- Optimize compression for growth"];Tools[label="Tools to Use:
- git repack with path walk
- git survey for diagnostics"];Insights->Tools;}Challenges->LargeFolderIssue[label="Lesson #1"];Challenges->Issue[label="Lesson #2"];}
